                                                          CategoryType categoryType,

                                                          boolean includeSuperadminsPrivateCategories)
                                                   throws ServiceException

user - User
categoryType - Category type

includeSuperadminsPrivateCategories - Flag to indicate if we want to include (true) or not to include (false) private categories of users with permission to improve permisions over its owned ones

getCategoriesSortedByHierarchy

public java.util.List<Category> getCategoriesSortedByHierarchy(User user,
                                                               CategoryType categoryType,
                                                               boolean includeUserCategories,
                                                               boolean includeGlobalCategories,
                                                               int includeOtherUserCategories)
                                                        throws ServiceException
Parameters:
user - User
categoryType - Category type
includeUserCategories - Flag to indicate if we want to include user categories in results
includeGlobalCategories - Flag to indicate if we want to include global categories in results
includeOtherUserCategories - Value indicating if we want to include public categories of other users in the categories tree (none, public, private, all)
Returns:
List of filtered categories sorted hierarchically
Throws:
ServiceException

includeGlobalCategories - Flag to indicate if we want to include global categories in results
includeOtherUserCategories - Value indicating if we want to include public categories of other users in the categories tree (none, public, private, all)
includeAdminsPrivateCategories - Flag to indicate if we want to include (true) or not to include (false) private categories of administrators
includeSuperadminsPrivateCategories - Flag to indicate if we want to include (true) or not to include (false) private categories of users with permission to improve permisions over its owned ones
Returns:
List of filtered categories sorted hierarchically
Throws:
ServiceException

getCategoriesSortedByHierarchy

public java.util.List<Category> getCategoriesSortedByHierarchy(HibernateUtil.Operation operation,
                                                               User user,
                                                               CategoryType categoryType,
                                                               boolean includeUserCategories,
                                                               boolean includeGlobalCategories,
                                                               int includeOtherUserCategories,
                                                               boolean includeAdminsPrivateCategories,
                                                               boolean includeSuperadminsPrivateCategories)
                                                        throws ServiceException
Parameters:
operation - Operation
user - User
categoryType - Category type
includeUserCategories - Flag to indicate if we want to include user categories in results

includeOtherUserCategories - Value indicating if we want to include public categories of other users in the categories tree (none, public, private, all)
includeAdminsPrivateCategories - Flag to indicate if we want to include (true) or not to include (false) private categories of administrators
includeSuperadminsPrivateCategories - Flag to indicate if we want to include (true) or not to include (false) private categories of users with permission to improve permisions over its owned ones
Returns:
List of filtered categories sorted hierarchically

ServiceException

isDerivedFrom

private boolean isDerivedFrom(HibernateUtil.Operation operation,
                              java.util.List<Category> checkedCategories,
                              Category category,
                              Category from)
                       throws ServiceException
Checks if category derives from indicated category.

Note that this method keep track of previously checked categories to avoid an infinite recursivity.

This case can occur if there is corrupted data within DB and then this method will break recursivity returning false.

Parameters:
operation - Operation
checkedCategories - Categories already checked
category - Category to check
from - Category from we check if category derives
Returns:
true if category derives from indicated category, false otherwise (or in case of corrupted data)
Throws:
ServiceException

                             Category from)
                      throws ServiceException

removeAdminsPrivateCategories

private void removeAdminsPrivateCategories(HibernateUtil.Operation operation,
                                           java.util.List<Category> categories,
                                           boolean checkVisibility)
Remove private categories of administrators from received categories list.

Note that visibility checks can be avoided passing 'checkVisibility' argument as false, this is intended to improve performance in several cases that we don't need to check visibility.

Parameters:
operation - Operation
categories - List of categories
checkVisibility - Flag to indicate if we want to perform visibility checks to be sure that we only remove private categories (true) or we don't want to perform that checks (false)

removeSuperadminsPrivateCategories

private void removeSuperadminsPrivateCategories(HibernateUtil.Operation operation,
                                                java.util.List<Category> categories,
                                                boolean checkVisibility)
Remove private categories of users with permission to improve permissions overs their owned ones (superadmins) from received categories list.

Note that visibility checks can be avoided passing 'checkVisibility' argument as false, this is intended to improve performance in several cases that we don't need to check visibility.

Parameters:
operation - Operation
categories - List of categories
checkVisibility - Flag to indicate if we want to perform visibility checks to be sure that we only remove private categories (true) or we don't want to perform that checks (false)

removeAdminsAndSuperadminsPrivateCategories

private void removeAdminsAndSuperadminsPrivateCategories(HibernateUtil.Operation operation,
                                                         java.util.List<Category> categories,
                                                         boolean checkVisibility)
Remove private categories of administrators and users with permission to improve permissions overs their owned ones (superadmins) from received categories list.

Note that visibility checks can be avoided passing 'checkVisibility' argument as false, this is intended to improve performance in several cases that we don't need to check visibility.

Parameters:
operation - Operation
categories - List of categories
checkVisibility - Flag to indicate if we want to perform visibility checks to be sure that we only remove private categories (true) or we don't want to perform that checks (false)
